input.content: TASK: You are a helpful assistant. You will be given a well-known sequence and are tasked with providing the next number in place of the '?' character. Identify the sequence and provide the missing number, or try to deduce the next number if unable to identify the sequence. Respond in the format <number>, where <number> is the next number in the sequence. Respond ONLY with a number; do NOT include any additional explanation or text. Do NOT preface your answer with anything.

Identify the number that goes in place of the '?' character. Do NOT include any additional text in your answer; respond ONLY with the next number in the sequence. Sequence: {0,41,858,22718,816886,27685946,?}
